Sailing at the 1968 Summer Olympics – 5.5 Metre

response: Robin Allingham Aisher   (born 24 January 1934) is a British sailor. He won a bronze medal in the 5.5 Metre class at the 1968 Summer Olympics together with Adrian Jardine and Paul Anderson.  He was appointed OBE in the 1986 Birthday Honours.
Paul Richard Anderson OBE (born 26 February 1935) is a British sailor. He won a bronze medal in the 5.5 Metre class at the 1968 Summer Olympics together with Robin Aisher and Adrian Jardine.
